data.text: As part of the government repatriation operations, we landed in Auckland on March 26th to bring stranded people home with our D-ABVY. A historic flight! We usually don't fly to this destination, so the 744 is the first Lufthansa aircraft in New Zealand. #WeAreInThisTogether https://t.co/hEGgHjDbqt

urls.title: Cancellation and refund
urls.description: Travel plans can often change unexpectedly. Regardless of that, our services help you reach your destination. Using online refund option, Lufthansa flight bookings* can be cancelled and refunded online up to 24 hours before the beginning of your trip.
